item.title: Bark beetle infestation in Norway spruce forests
item.author: Author
item.description: Bark beetle damages cause widespread pine dead. Check out our recent findings on the effect of acute drought for bark bettle infestation!

item.title: Bacterial diseases concern winegrowers
item.author: Author
item.description: At first glance, the vineyards looks healthy. Find out how a bacterial diseases affect grapevines and how the study of the interplay of insect vector-host plant-pathogen-crop can help to mitigate disease pressure…
